content: Nice idea but buggy. Firstly, it doesn’t recognise the city I’m in (Birmingham, uk — just the 1 million people here, nothing major). It does tell me of neighbouring towns and cities, but when, for example, telling me I’m 39km from Worcester, England, it also has an entry for Worcestor, Masschusetts (also 39km, apparently). Similar for Stratford, as apparently Shakespeare came from Ontario :). Not even sure where Dresden is, but apparently Dresden, Germany is just 56km away!
